payload.root_cause: Network connectivity issue between analytics-node-07 and logging-gateway
payload.recommendation:
- Check and verify the network connectivity between analytics-node-07 and logging-gateway (confidence: 0.9)
- Implement a more robust retry mechanism for log push to logging-gateway to handle temporary connection timeouts (confidence: 0.8)
- Increase the log buffer size on analytics-node-07 to reduce the likelihood of log buffer overflow (confidence: 0.7)
